Dear Sheffield City Council,
I would like to request information regarding the budget allocations from Sheffield City Council for the following areas:
Parks
Woodlands/Forests
Allotments
Street Trees
Could you please provide the amounts allocated for each of these categories?
Yours faithfully,
Naomi

Dear Naomi,
Thank you for your request for information relating to budgeting for green
space which we received on 25/07/2024.
As your request is a request for information relating to the environment,
this has been logged as a request under the Environmental Information
Regulations 2004 (EIR) and will be dealt with under the Regulations. The
reference number for your request can be found above.
The Environmental Information Regulations 2004 state that we must respond
to you within 20 working days, by 23/08/2024. Please do not hesitate to
contact us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,

Dear Naomi,
Thank you for your request for information relating to budgeting for green
space which we received on 25/07/2024.
Please find Sheffield City Council’s response to your request set out
below:
The following information sets out the 24/25 net budget allocations for
the areas requested.
The value given for the Tree Team covers all work the Tree Team undertake,
including maintenance in parks, woodland and on other council land. It is
therefore relevant, but it does not however, include Street Trees.
Sheffield City Council has a Private Finance Initiative contract with Amey
Hallam Highways Ltd for the delivery of a complete highway maintenance
service which includes all highway maintenance activities such as street
lighting, street cleaning, the maintenance of highway trees, carriageway
and footway resurfacing, signal maintenance etc.  Payments made by the
Council under the contract do not relate to the provision of specific
items of work. Instead, a single payment is made for each month of the
25-year term of the contract. As a result, we do not have a figure for the
budget applied by Amey for individual operations such as the maintenance
of highway trees.
Also included below is the budget allocation for our Rangers team which
provide support and maintenance for Woodland.

│ │£         │

├──────────────────┼──────────────────┤
│ │-£             │
│Allotments │1,400.00 │
├──────────────────┼──────────────────┤
│Trees │£     1,026,000.00│
└──────────────────┴──────────────────┘
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to

If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your

If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you

Kind Regards,

Sheffield, S1 1UJ
